text: Khao soi is a curry noodle dish often found in Myanmar, Laos, and northern Thailand. It is made from egg or rice noodles and coconut curry. Ingredients often added to khao soi include chicken, fried noodles, onions, cilantro, garlic, ginger, lime, toasted chilies, and other ingredients. ==References== Category:Thai food Category:Laotian food Category:Burmese food Category:Noodles
title: Khao soi
